item.title: 2020 年代城市房地产的逆转
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 超越 Memeat Meme Turn 让敞篷车持有者体验狂野之旅
item.description: 四年前，Beyond Meat 公司出售了 2027 年到期的零息可转换债券，利用人们对植物肉类产品未来的巨大赌注，筹集了超过 10 亿美元的资金。【原文：Four years ago, Beyond Meat Inc. was able to raise over $1 billion selling a a zero-coupon convertible bond due 2027, taking advantage of rampant bets on the future of plant-based meat products.】

item.title: 德国商业银行前首席执行官在意大利联合信贷银行购入股份后会见 Orcel
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，去年 9 月，在意大利联合信贷银行披露入股德国商业银行后不久，德国商业银行前首席执行官曼弗雷德-克诺夫（Manfred Knof）与意大利联合信贷银行首席执行官安德里亚-奥塞尔（Andrea Orcel）进行了一次私下会面。【原文：Commerzbank AG’s former Chief Executive Officer Manfred Knof had a private meeting with UniCredit SpA CEO Andrea Orcel in September of last year, shortly after the Italian bank disclosed it had taken a stake in Commerzbank, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据说 Banijay 正在谈判收购 CVC 旗下博彩公司 Tipico
item.description: 据知情人士透露，Betclic 的所有者 Banijay Group NV 正在就收购 CVC Capital Partners Plc 旗下的德国体育博彩公司 Tipico 进行深入谈判。【原文：Banijay Group NV, the owner of Betclic, is in advanced talks to buy CVC Capital Partners Plc’s German sports-betting business Tipico, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 高德美公司支持者出售价值 35 亿美元的股份
item.description: 以 EQT AB 为首的高德美集团三方股东正寻求出售这家瑞士护肤品公司 8.4% 的股份。【原文：A trio of shareholders in Galderma Group AG led by EQT AB are looking to sell an 8.4% stake in the Swiss skincare company.】

item.title: 与会代表称，"欧佩克+"基础方案目前只是小幅加息
item.description: 据两位代表称，目前预计欧佩克+将在本周末举行的主要成员国会议上重点讨论在 12 月份再恢复一小部分石油产量的基本情况。【原文：OPEC+ is currently expected to focus on reviving another modest sliver of oil production in December as a base case when key members meet this weekend, according to two delegates.】

item.title: 中国简化外国投资者规则以吸引长期资金
item.description: 中国市场监督管理局推出了一项简化海外机构投资者计划规则的计划，以吸引更多长期资金进入中国资本市场。【原文：China’s market watchdog rolled out a plan to simplify rules for its overseas institutional investors program to attract more long-term funds into the country’s capital markets.】

item.title: 中美谈判激发贸易复苏希望，大豆大涨
item.description: 由于中美谈判取得进展，大豆和其他农作物价格飙升，这让人们对世界上最大的两个经济体正朝着在旷日持久的贸易战中达成协议的方向迈进产生了希望。【原文：Soybeans and other crops soared as progress in negotiations between the US and China lifted hopes that the world’s two largest economies were edging toward a deal in their protracted trade war.】

item.title: 人工智能金融科技公司 Optasia 以 2.77 亿美元向 FirstRand 出售股权
item.description: 人工智能金融技术公司 Optasia 在首次公开募股前向南非 FirstRand 有限公司出售了 20.1% 的股份。【原文：Artificial intelligence-powered financial-technology firm Optasia sold a 20.1% stake to South Africa’s FirstRand Ltd. ahead of its initial public offering.】

item.title: 部长称日本接近向巴西牛肉开放市场
item.description: 据南美国家农业部长称，日本 "非常接近 "向巴西牛肉开放市场，此举将进一步打击美国的出口。【原文：Japan is “very close” to opening its market to Brazilian beef, according to the South American country’s agriculture minister, in a move that would be a further blow to US exports.】

item.title: Genco 首席执行官称中国大豆计划是干散货贸易的关键
item.description: Genco Shipping & Trading Ltd. 首席执行官约翰-沃本史密斯（John C. Wobensmith）表示，在中美贸易谈判期间，干散货托运人正在关注中国政府何时恢复购买美国大豆。首席执行官约翰-沃本史密斯（John C. Wobensmith）说。【原文：Dry-bulk shippers are watching to see when Beijing will resume purchases of US soybeans amid China-US trade talks, said Genco Shipping & Trading Ltd. Chief Executive Officer John C. Wobensmith.】

item.title: 生物技术公司 MapLight 利用停摆修复首次在美国上市，股价大涨 23
item.description: MapLight Therapeutics Inc. 在首次公开募股和私募融资 2.589 亿美元后，这家生物技术公司的股价跳涨了 23%。【原文：MapLight Therapeutics Inc. shares jumped as much as 23% after the biotechnology firm raised $258.9 million in an initial public offering and private placement.】

item.title: Meta's Thread 为 "未经过滤 "的想法添加消失的帖子
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司的 X 竞争对手 Threads 正在推出会消失的帖子，以鼓励更多的人在网络上分享 "未经过滤的想法"，而不必担心这些帖子会永远存在于用户的个人资料中。【原文：Threads, the X competitor from Meta Platforms Inc., is launching disappearing posts to encourage more people to share “unfiltered thoughts” on the network without fear that they’ll exist forever on a user’s profile.】

item.title: 收购巨头 Vista 向 Permira 收购 Nexthink 股份，押注人工智能领域
item.description: Vista Equity Partners 在一份声明中说，该公司收购了 Nexthink SA 的多数股份，对这家瑞美软件公司的估值为 30 亿美元。【原文：Vista Equity Partners snapped up a majority stake in Nexthink SA, valuing the Swiss-American software company at $3 billion, the firm said in a statement.】

item.title: 尽管政府提供了 410 亿美元的支持，墨西哥石油公司仍报告亏损
item.description: 墨西哥石油公司（Petroleos Mexicanos）出现亏损，这是一个早期信号，表明总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆（Claudia Sheinbaum）的 410 亿美元支持计划可能不足以扭转这家债务缠身的石油巨头的局面。【原文：Petroleos Mexicanos swung to a loss, an early signal that President Claudia Sheinbaum’s $41 billion support package may not be enough to turn around the debt-burdened oil giant.】

item.title: 阿布扎比 XRG 正在洽谈投资阿根廷液化天然气项目
item.description: 阿布扎比最大石油公司的海外部门正在洽谈投资阿根廷 YPF SA 公司正在开发的液化天然气项目，该公司正努力开始出口这种燃料。【原文：The overseas unit of Abu Dhabi’s biggest oil company is in talks to invest in a liquefied natural gas project Argentina’s YPF SA is developing as it pushes to start exporting the fuel.】

item.title: 对冲 16 万亿美元 S&P 500 指数涨势的成本在美联储会议前上升
item.description: 周五姗姗来迟的通胀数据巩固了华尔街对美联储将在本周政策会议上降息的押注。但这并不意味着股票投资者就可以高枕无忧了。【原文：Friday’s belated inflation reading cemented Wall Street bets that the Federal Reserve will cut rates at this week’s policy meeting. That doesn’t mean equity investors are sounding the all-clear.】

item.title: 摩根大通对伦敦金库的掌控受到竞争对手银行的挑战
item.description: 随着投资者对贵金属的兴趣激增，花旗集团（Citigroup Inc.【原文：Citigroup Inc. and Morgan Stanley are among banks preparing to challenge the dominance of JPMorgan Chase & Co. in the global gold market by seeking to offer vaulting services in London, as investor interest in the precious metal surges.】

item.title: 赌博、加密货币对尼日利亚人的影响正在损害资本市场
item.description: 尼日利亚金融监管机构负责人表示，尼日利亚人喜欢把钱投入赌博和加密货币，而不是资本市场，这使尼日利亚失去了本可用于建设关键基础设施的资金。【原文：Nigerians’ preference for plowing their money into gambling and cryptocurrencies rather than the capital market is denying the nation of funds that could be used to build key infrastructure, the head of the financial regulator said.】

item.title: 推进执法工作，东区收入五年来增幅最大
item.description: 伊斯特里政府物业公司（Easterly Government Properties Inc.【原文：Easterly Government Properties Inc.’s quarterly revenue surged the most in five years, driven by the Trump administration’s focus on law enforcement-spending.】

item.title: 海上石油运输量飙升至新纪录，进一步表明供过于求
item.description: 航行在世界各大洋上的石油数量激增，创下了新的记录，这表明，尽管对俄罗斯最大的几家石油公司实施制裁后价格有所上涨，但石油供应仍在继续增加。【原文：The amount of oil sailing the world’s oceans surged to a fresh record, a sign of how supplies are continuing to mount despite the price gains that followed sanctions on some of Russia’s biggest oil companies.】

item.title: Cinven 据称酝酿以 30 亿欧元出售软件制造商 Think-Cell
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，私募股权公司 Cinven 正在考虑出售德国软件公司 think-cell，这笔交易的估值可能高达 30 亿欧元（35 亿美元）。【原文：Private equity firm Cinven is considering a sale of German software company think-cell, which could be valued at as much as €3 billion ($3.5 billion) in a deal, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 英国为 2030 年的海上风电项目制定 11 亿英镑预算
item.description: 在即将举行的拍卖中，英国将拨款 11 亿英镑（15 亿美元）支持海上风力发电能力。【原文：The UK will allocate £1.1 billion ($1.5 billion) to support offshore wind capacity in an upcoming auction.】

item.title: 墨西哥谢因鲍姆称美国将贸易期限延长数周
item.description: 美国总统克劳迪娅-希恩鲍姆表示，美国将把与墨西哥达成贸易协议的最后期限延长数周，这将是唐纳德-特朗普给予其南部邻国的最新一次缓刑。【原文：The US is extending a deadline to reach a trade deal with Mexico for several weeks, President Claudia Sheinbaum said, in what would be the latest reprieve Donald Trump has granted his southern neighbor.】

item.title: 新加坡政府投资公司（GIC）寻求出售 10 亿美元的 PE 基金股权
item.description: 新加坡主权财富基金新加坡政府投资公司（GIC Pte）正寻求出售部分私募股权基金股份，继续利用蓬勃发展的二级市场来管理其投资组合。【原文：Singapore sovereign wealth fund GIC Pte is looking to offload some of its private equity fund stakes, continuing to utilize the booming secondaries market to manage its portfolio.】

item.title: 巴菲特的伯克希尔公司因盈利和继任风险罕见遭到抛售
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc. 获得罕见的卖出评级，分析师对其盈利前景持谨慎态度，并持续担忧沃伦-巴菲特即将离职和宏观风险。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway Inc. got a rare sell rating, with analysts cautious on its earnings outlook and ongoing concerns over Warren Buffett’s upcoming departure and macro risks.】

item.title: 国际清算银行称私人信贷风险 "夸大 "了小公司的评级
item.description: 国际清算银行表示，保险公司使用的私人信用等级往往集中在较小的评级公司中，这增加了 "信用度评估被夸大 "的风险。【原文：Private credit grades used by insurance companies tend to be concentrated among smaller ratings firms, raising the risk of “inflated assessments of creditworthiness,” the Bank for International Settlements said.】

item.title: 波兰与帕兰提尔和 Anduril 签订协议，军队开支创历史新高
item.description: 波兰周一分别与帕兰提尔科技公司（Palantir Technologies Inc.【原文：Poland signed two separate deals with Palantir Technologies Inc. and Anduril Industries Inc. on Monday as the country steps up to upgrade its army amid record military spending.】

item.title: Blackstone 利用私人信贷发放 Signant 贷款
item.description: 据熟悉该交易的人士透露，Blackstone Inc. 正牵头为生命科学公司 Signant Health 进行私人信贷融资，以取代超过 10 亿美元的银行牵头的杠杆贷款。【原文：Blackstone Inc. is leading a private credit financing for life-sciences company Signant Health to replace more than $1 billion in bank-led leveraged loans, according to people familiar with the transaction.】

item.title: 米莱赢得重塑阿根廷的新机会和严峻挑战
item.description: 哈维尔-米莱伊（Javier Milei）的政党在周日晚些时候举行的中期选举中大获全胜，并得到了美国的支持，这为这位自由主义总统提供了新的动力，促使他寻求彻底改革阿根廷，打破该国债务、违约和危机的恶性循环。【原文：A resounding win for Javier Milei’s party in midterm elections late Sunday — with a lifeline from the US — gave the libertarian president new momentum for his quest to overhaul Argentina and break the country’s cycle of debt, default and crisis.】
